lead_paragraph: ABRAMSON-Richard. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Richard Abramson, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Richard's beloved wife, Lorraine; his children, Jill Manczyk (Jacob) and Gregg (Lauren); his grandchildren, Miles, Sadie, Emma, and Leah; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
